casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Douglas HUCKABEE 380P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 John Douglass Huckabee, for Huckabee, John Douglas. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

*644The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of October 2018 by Defendant for Dismissal:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
